channel.title: 317 PI how to add remove objects/walls
channel.description: Hey guys, bad programmer here, I am trying to take out some walls and some objects (mainly walls and objects in the edgeville bank) and I can't seem to do so. I've looked up tuts and none of them seem to be helpful... I also wanna add in objects

item.title: 317 PI how to add remove objects/walls
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:521487”]if (c.heightLevel == 0) {
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2492, 2911, 3614, 1, 10);
}else{
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2911, 3614, 1, 10);
}

There’s an example for height based spawns[/quote]

ive tried that objects will do two different things when i try this method

  1. spawn on different heights
  2. not show up at all on any height

Read full topic

}

item.title: 317 PI how to add remove objects/walls
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2130, 5101, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(3044, 2133, 5092, 1, 10);

Red: -1 means remove an object.
Green: ObjectId to add.
Orange: AbsX Co’ord.
Purple: AbsY Co’ord.
Brown: Rotation. N/E/S/W
Black: Object type.

You shouldn’t need to mess with the black number.

Use these codes in ObjectManager.java.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 PI how to add remove objects/walls
